passives.name: Hack the Meat
passives.effects: Dealing damage reduces the target's {{as|armor}} and {{as|magic resistance}} by 3 for 5 seconds, stacking up to 10 times for a total resistances reduction of 30. Stacks can be applied to each enemy only once every second.

passives.name: Cannibalize
passives.effects: If you or the allied champion on your team score a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion, you are both {{tip|heal|healed}} for {{as|18% of the taken down target's '''maximum''' health}}.

effects_structured.raw: Dealing damage reduces the target's {{as armor}} and {{as magic resistance}} by 3 for 5 seconds, stacking up to 10 times for a total resistances reduction of 30
If you or the allied champion on your team score a {{tip takedown}} against an enemy champion, you are both {{tip heal healed}} for {{as 18% of the taken down target's '''maximum''' health}}.
